card.name: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer
card.graphics: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable on Barliman Butterbur during the site phase at Bree. t+1 to his body and CC. Tap BarlimanButterbur during your organization phase to bring a Marvels Told, Glamour of Surpassing Excellence or Memories Recalled from your sideboard or discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Discard this card if Barliman Butterbur is not at Bree or if Bree becomes a Haven [H].

card.name: A Thing of Surpassing Potency
card.text: Playable if The One Ring is in play and borne by a non-Hobbit character with a mind greater than 4. All bonusses from other special items and rings in play are modified by -1 (to a minimum of 1). Additionally, all CC by other ringbearers are modified by -1, and any manifestation of Narya, Nenya or Vilya cannot be used.

card.name: A Weapon in the Right Hands
card.graphics: A Weapon in the Right Hands.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable on The One Ring.

attr.value: Tap a Hobbit to take Mathom Lore from your discard pile to your hand; Mathom Lore may be played here as if at Bag End.
Information, Items (minor*) *—Secret Book, Records Unread or Thror's Map only-
(1st) Hobbits — 3 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess
all Information resources in play by hero players are worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Asfaloth
card.text: Unique. Horse. Playable at any non-Haven [H] site in Rhudauror Cardolan. Characters with home site Rivendell may playAsfaloth at a tapped site. tap: cancel a strike against its bearer or itself from a non- automatic attack or Nazgûl attack. If the controller of Asfaloth is the only character in the company he may move 3 additional non-Coastal Sea [c] regions when moving to a site where another company is present and Asfaloth may tap to give +1 to all of his CC this turn.

card.name: Backpack
card.text: taTap bearer and discard Backpack to replace it withany non-unique, non-hoard minor item from your discard pile or sideboard. If bearer is Sam Gamgee you may take 2 minor items (no Backpack) instead. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Beer from the East-farthing
card.text: Food item. Playable at a site in The Shire. May also be played from sideboard at any site on a Hobbit bearing Backpack, if his company is forced to do nothing during the site phase (this card overrides that effect). Playing this item does not tap the site. Discard this item to allow the company to undertake actions (e.g. make an influence attempt) and play non-mp resource cards during the site phase.

card.name: Behind the Hedge
card.text: Playable on a scout or ranger (grey) agent. If during the organization phase target agent is at a site where an opponent’s company is present, opponent must reveal his hand to you. Additionally, the agent may then take an extra agent action this turn or move 3 regions when moving. Discard this card after an attack by the agent.

card.name: Black Riders
card.text: Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Nazgûl creatures may be played against hero companies keyed to Border-land [b], Wilderness [w], and Shadow-land [s], and to non-Haven [H] non-Free-hold [F] sites in these regions. Any Nazgûl attacking in this way is detainment, unless a character in the defending company bears a ring special item. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Bob
card.text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable at Bree. Also playable at any site in Arthedain or The Shire if you discard (for no effect) Memories Recalled. A company with Barliman Butterbur may play Bob at a tapped site. tap: fullfill the requirement of discarding Lost Knowledge for a card played with/on his company.

attr.value: Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against hero companies); tMerry may tap to cancel this attack.

Port on Baranduin. Hobbits faction and any Hobbit character is playable at this site. Undead and Awakened Plant creatures keyable to Wilderness [w] may be played at this site; any Hobbit receives +4 prowess against a strike from such an attack.
(1st) Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess
Port on Baranduin. *You may play a gold ring item the same turn To Satisfy the Questioner is played at this (tapped) site.

card.name: Broken Heirlooms
card.text: All (stage) resource effects that would modify the mp value of an item, ally or faction to be worth more than their normal mp value (as listed on their card) are cancelled. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Capricious Spirit
card.text: Playable on a maia, demon or spawn ally. The controlling character must make an influence check against the ally. Make a roll and add the controlling character’s unused EI; if the result is lower than the ally’s mind +6, discard the ally.

card.name: Compass
card.text: Ranger only: tap: prevent the company from being forced to move to another site (except by environment or ring hazards, or by magic effects). Bearer makes a CC. Sage only: tap: if a Knowledge or Lore card is in the company to fulfill all requirements to move to a Hidden Site. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Courtesy Lessened of Late
card.text: Playable only on-guard. Reveal this card to target and cancel any card or effect that would allow opponent to bring in a character with the company during the site phase.

card.name: Deeds of Lonely Daring
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on one of your grey agent characters in play. Turn the character face down, he now is an agent. Discard any hazards and Draw Swords Together on him. Discard any allies he controls and place him at another site in the same or an adjacent region as his current site. Target agent must make a CC during his untap phase.

card.name: Do Not Use It Again
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on an item borne by a character in a company of 3 or more characters at a Haven [H]. Item is “concealed.” While concealed the item is worth half its mp value (round down), gives 0 CP, and cannot be used. Concealed items cannot be discarded and are not affected by hazards or resources. Discard this card if the company size is below 3, during any next organization phase if you so choose, if bearer becomes wounded in CvCC or when the item is stored.

card.name: Down the Hurrying Waters
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company at a Port (-on-River) containing a scout or a ranger. The company may move with Port-on-River movement this turn: the site path must contain all regions the river moves through (up to/starting from the current Port-on-River site/site of destination), yet does not contain the region types of such regions. Any non-unique creature keyable to Coastal Seas [c] is playable on the company.

card.name: Eagle-watch
card.text: Unique. Playable at Isildur’s Tomb or Daeron’s Pool if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: if an Eagle ally, Gandalf or Radagast is in the company (+3) (apply only once). May not be played by an overt company. If you are a Wizard or Elf-lord, you may play Spying out the Land as if a spell.

card.name: Estel
card.text: Unique. Playable on Strider or Thorongil if at a Haven [H]. +1 to his CC. tap: cancel an effect in the same chain-of- effects that required an agent at his site to tap.

card.name: Fate Let Our Ways Meet
card.text: Playable with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Instead of a normal character, you may play one non-overt character (or two Hobbits) with the starting company regardless of his race. Additionally, the character’s home site is not considered when determining the company’s starting site. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Fatty Bolger
card.text: Unique. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. All his CC are modified by +1. tap: cancel a strike against another hobbit in his company.

card.name: Fatty Lumpkin
card.text: Unique. Horse. Only playable at Tom’s House on the controller of Tom Bombadil or Goldberry (even if the site is tapped). tap: cancel any hazard effect that would discard an ally, or to return an ally that has been discarded this turn to your hand from discard pile.

card.name: Flight Unmarked
card.text: Playable on a company at the end of the organization phase, if you tap a ranger and a scout (or an avatar with either of these skills). The company may (attempt to) move to an Under-deeps site with a surface site in the same or an adjacent region as their current site (or vice versa). They are considered to use both region and Under-deeps movement. Any required roll for moving to/from the surface site must still be made. Alternatively, tap a ranger or a scout to fulfill all requirements for moving to a hidden site.

card.name: Fly, You Fools!
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a company facing an on-guard creature. The highest prowess character or avatar in the company (your choice) faces the creature alone. After the attack, all other characters in the company must move to a new site in the same or an adjacent region: a new movement/hazard phase follows, tap all untapped characters in the company after their new movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Focussed Staff
card.text: Ritual. Playable on a Wizard’s Staff during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. taTap the Wizard.+1 to all his CC required for rituals, spells and light enchantments. tap: give +2 to all rolls required for bearer’s company to move to adjacent Under-deeps sites. tap: give -2 prowess to an Undead attack against bearer’s company. Bearer makes a CC when this card becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Foe Beyond Any of You
card.text: Playable on an attack with a prowess of 11 or morecreated by a unique hazard. All strikes must be assignedto the highest prowess character in the company (including all modifications; defender’s choice if equal), regardless of his status or any card effect. Each excess strike gives a -1 modification to his prowess; Pierced by Many Wounds cannot be played on the attack.

attr.value: Hidden site. Tap a scout to move to this site. A diplomat may tap to cancel the automatic-attack. Discard a food item from the company to make Gems of Arda playable this turn.
Hidden site. Tap a scout to move to this site. A diplomat may tap to cancel the automatic-attack. You may take a Giant creature from your discard pile to your hand when this site leaves active play.

card.name: Glutan
card.text: Animal. Wolf. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any Wilderness [w] region in Eriador or Wilderland and to Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions.

card.name: Golden Chain
card.text: Playable at any Haven [H] on the bearer of The One Ring, regardless of his status. Place this card with The One Ring anddiscard it when that item leaves play for any reason. The One Ring gives 1 less mp and 1 less CP. Bearer may opt to use its bonus to prowess, body and EI, but must make a CC if using it (e.g. before facing a strike for prowess/body, before making an influence attempt, and/or during organization phase for controlling a characterI). This item gives no CP.

card.name: Green Leaves and Lilies White
card.text: Unique. Playable on Tom Bombadil. If in the company of Goldberry, Tom Bombadil is not discarded as per his card text. Discard this card if he is not in the company of Goldberry or your Wizard or Elf-lord.

card.name: Grey Pilgrim
card.text: Playable on Gandalf during your organization phase. If his company contains no other characters or allies, he may move up to 5 regions, his hazard limit is reduced by 1, and River or Enchanted Stream cannot be played against him.

card.name: Grip! Fang! Wolf!
card.text: Playable on a Noble Hound, when his company is facing a creature attack. Make a roll and add Noble Hound’s prowess; if the result is greater than the prowess of the hazard creature that your company is facing, put it in your mp (all of its attacks are defeated). Otherwise, remove Noble Hound from the game.

card.name: Hands of the Weak
card.text: All hero characters with mind less than 6 and normal prowess less than 4 gain +1 prowess and +1 EI Each avatar and hero character with mind greater than 7 must make a roll at the end of their organization phase. If the result is less than 5, that character is tapped. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Helm Clove Asunder
card.text: Playable after a successful strike by one of your characters in CvCC. Make a roll for a battle-gear item borne by the wounded character, modified by +2 if your character bears a weapon (+3 if the weapon is unique). If the result is greater than 9, discard opponent’s item. May be played during your opponent’s turn.

card.name: His Own Master
card.text: No ally may be played at a tapped site. Unless Doors of Night is in play, no ally may be played at a Haven [H]. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: I Pass the Test
card.text: Playable on The One Ring, if the bearer is at a Haven [H]. Rotate this card 90° each time a Wizard or a character with a mind greater than 5 at the same site as the bearer of The One Ring (other than the bearer) passes a CC. This may only be done once per turn, and once per game for each given character. This card gives 1 mp for each time rotated. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: It Is My Own
card.text: No item can be stored. Any characterattempting to store a non-item card must make a CC modified by -2.

card.name: Keeping of Good Faith
card.text: Playable on a hazard creature with an asterix (*) with 1 strike for each of its attacks attacking a hero company. All attacks are cancelled and the creature becomes an ally under the control of any character in the company that now taps (otherwise discard this card). It has a mind of 1, prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7 (to a minimum of 0), and a body as listed on its card (8 if none is listed). The ally is worth ally mp equal to the mp value as listed on its card.Alternatively, may be played on a detainment attack against a hero company: the attack is cancelled.

card.name: Kheled-zâram
card.text: Playable on a character at Dimrill Dale if Doors of Night isin play. When you play this card, heal and/or untap thecharacter, or untap the site: you may take an Information resource from your discard pile to hand. Character makes a CC at -2 (-3 if a Dwarf). All automatic-attacks at Dimrill Dale receive +1 to prowess and strikes. Next time character would untap discard this card instead. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Light and Flame
card.text: Spell. -2 prowess to all Ringwraith and Dragon-characters at the site for the rest of the turn. May also be played in response to a card played by a Ringwraith or Dragon-character at your site during the site phase: his company must immediately engage in CvCC with your company. Additionally, any Ringwraith must also be taken to hand on a body check result of 6 or 9 (unless killed by the roll).Wizard makes a CC modified by -3.

card.name: Local Hospitality
card.text: Playable on a non-overt company containing a character whose home site is the same as the company’s current site. Heal (from wounded to tapped) or untap a character in the company whose home site is not the company’s current site.

card.name: Long wailing Cry
card.text: Playable on a hero company facing a Nazgûl attack. Tap all characters in the company whose mind value is lower than the number of Nazgûl permanent events in play.

card.name: Looking Forward
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on your Wizard. Tap your Wizard to look at the top 7 cards of any play deck. The Wizard may choose to face one creature thus revealed as if a single character company (discard creature after the attack). Any attack against the Wizard’s company by (copies of) this creature is cancelled for the rest of the turn. Return the other cards to the top of the play deck in any order you choose.

card.name: Lore of the Rings
card.text: Place this card on your sage avatar when in play. He may tap to test a gold ring in his company; afterwards he makes a CC. Discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company to place Wisdom to Wield with this card from hand or discard pile: it affects your avatar and is not discarded (unless this card is discarded).

card.name: Many Burdens
card.text: Unique. Playable on an avatar, if your opponent has more than 6 characters or more than 2 companies in play. Tap the avatar if untapped. Next time he would untap, remove this card from the game instead.

card.name: Many Leagues
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on your Elf-lordor Wizard (except Saruman), if at a non-Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], or at Isengard. You may reveal as a site card any Haven [H] or Free- hold [F] in the same or an adjacent territory, if his company size is equal to or lower than the number of following cards in the company (allies without Flying ability count as characters): Gwaihir, Meneldor, Winged Change Master, The Windlord Found Me. You are considered moving only through the region of the starting site. Wizard or Elf-lord makes a CC at -2.

card.name: Memories Grown Dim
card.text: Any company that wants to play a Lost Knowledgecard or fullfil the requirement of Lost Knowledge being discarded must tap a sage in addition to any other requirements. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Memories of Ages Past
card.text: Playable on Gollum or Stinker. Gollum/Stinker is considered a Hobbit for all purposes. +2 to his riddling rolls. He must makea CC modified by -2 during the untap phase. Tap Gollum/Stinker to take a gold ring item playable at his current site, or a manifestation of an item controlled by an opponent at the site, from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Meneldor
card.text: Unique. Eagle. Winged. Playable at Eagle’s Eyrie.Also playable at the (tapped) site where you have played The Windlord Found Me this turn, if you have a manifestation of an Elf-lord or Wizard (except Saruman) in the company. You may store The Windlord Found Me at any Free-hold [F]: you may play any one character from your discard pile or play deck (as if Wizard at a Haven [H]). Discard Meneldor when moving to an Under-deeps site or a Dungeon, or if the company is overt.

attr.value: if successfull, place this site with Hobbits instead of discarding it (or returning it to the site deck), it is worth 2 mp.
(1st) Hobbits — 7 strikes with 4 prowess; (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess.
all resources and characters only playable or storable at sites in The Shire are worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Milo Burrows
card.text: Unique. Cannot be controlled by a Hobbit. Unless he is among the starting characters he may only be brought into play at his home site.

card.name: Mr. Underhill
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Frodo. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. You may replace Mr. Underhill during the organization phase with Frodo; he may be taken from play deck, discard pile, or sideboard; all non follower cards controlled by Mr. Underhill are transferred to Frodo. tap: during end-of-turn phase to take one Halfling Stealth from your discard pile to your hand. Discard Mr. Underhill if he moves to a site not in The Shire or its adjacent regions. .

attr.value: Bree, any site in The Shire

card.name: Much-trodden Paths
card.text: Any company sent back to its site of origin may still play cards and take actions the same turn. Additionally, any player may discard this card to cancel the effects of a hazard that would return a company to its site of origin or replace that company’s new site, if moving to a site where another of his companies is located. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: New Best Friend
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. Characters at this site may transfer any allies under their control to other characters in their company of the same or higher mind (or to an avatar). Afterwards, tap the ally if untapped. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to the location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: New Supplies
card.text: Playable on a Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B] site where you have a unique faction in play. At the end of the organization phase you may discard this card to take 2 food minor items from your sideboard and place them with different characters in a moving company (characters need not tap or be untapped). Cannot be duplicated for a given site.

card.name: No Memory of This Place
card.text: Cancels the effects of Secret Entrance and Forewarned is Forearmed. Additionally, each company intending to move with Under-deeps movement must make an Under-deeps movement roll for each adjacent site during the organization phase. This is done before a new site is selected and instead of during movement/hazard phase. Such roll is modified by -3, but if successful the site may be taken from location deck or discard pile. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: No Place for a Pony
card.text: Playable on a horse ally. Discard the ally if its company enters a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] this turn, or moves to an Under-deeps site or Dungeon. This card cannot be played on-guard.

card.name: Nob
card.text: Unique. May not be among the starting characters and may only be brought into play at his home site. Nob may be controlled by Barliman Butterbur or a Hobbit costing no direct influence. tap: tap a face-up agent at his current or new site.

card.name: Rangers at Sarn Ford
card.text: Dúnedain. 5 strikes. Only playable against minion companies. May be played keyed to Arthedain, Cardolan or The Shire. +2 prowess against Ringwraiths.

card.name: Reunion
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. All characters at the site receive +2 to their CC when transferring non-ring items between characters of the same race or characters with the same home site. Additionally, all characters at the site may transfer items during their end-of-turn phase. Discard this card if the site leaves active play or if a CC forced by transferring items at this site fails.

card.name: Ruddy Varmint
card.text: Unique. Animal. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Shire or its adjacent regions. +1 to trickery, burglary, flattery or riddling attempts made by a character in his company. tap: cancel a strike against himself from a non- automatic-attack.

attr.value: all rolls for Early Harvest played against your factions are modified by -2.
(1st) Hobbits — 5 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess.
play a food minor item from your sideboard with a company at Isengard or a site in The Shire.

card.name: Sancho Proudfoot
card.text: Unique. +1 to his burglary attempts. Unless he is among the starting characters he may only be brought into play at his home site.

card.name: Sanctuary for the Birds
card.text: Unique. Playable on Rhosgobel. One hero ally with Flying ability is playable with Radagast at the site each turn. Additionally, such allies may heal at Rhosgobel. This card gives -2 P to a Fallen-wizard player. Discard this card if Rhosgobel leaves active play.

card.name: Say 'Friend' and Enter
card.text: Ritual. Playable on a sage at the beginning of the sitephase (before facing any automatic-attacks). Tap the sage. Any ongoing hazard effect that causes the company to do nothing during the site phase is now cancelled (this card may be played regardless of such effects).

card.name: Second Breakfast
card.text: Playable on a moving company containing a Hobbit. Tap all Hobbits in the company. At the end of the movement/hazard phase you may take another movement/hazard phase and move to another site: you must move with region movement to a maximum of 3 regions. Alternatively, playable as a hazard short- event: tap a Hobbit (2 Hobbits if Fatty Bolger is in the company; defenders choice).

card.name: Seized upon the Bearer
card.text: Attacking hazard creatures may assign strikesto any ringbearers before other strikes are assigned (as normal). If such a strike is assigned to the bearer of The One Ring, the strike receives +2 prowess.

card.name: Shire-ale
card.text: Food Item. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border- hold [B] or Free-hold [F] in the Shire, or at Bree. Discard this item to discard any Despair of the Heart or Alone and Unadvised played on a character in the company; target character makes a body check modified by -1. Failing the body check wounds, but does not eliminate the character. A Hobbit bearer may discard this item to receive +3 prowess and -2 body untill the end of the turn; target Hobbit cannot use Halfling Stealth, Sneakin or Stealth and any ongoing effect of these cards is cancelled.

card.name: Some Devilry at Work
card.text: Playable on a face-up (grey) agent.The agent must return to any one of his home sites (controlling player’s choice; turn the agent face down if none of his home sites are available, he is considered at his home site).

card.name: Speak, Friend, and Enter!
card.text: Playable on a Shadow-hold [S], Dark-hold [D] or hidden site, against a moving hero company. Cannot be played on-guard. Unless the company contains a sage or Hobbit, or you discard a Knowledge or Information card from hand or the company, the company must do nothing during the site phase. Additionally, cancels the effects of Secret Entrance.

card.name: Taint of the Wilds
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar ranger. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring ranger skill is played on any member of his company. During the organization phase at his home site or a Haven [H] (or site that acts as a Haven for healing purposes) the character may tap to attempt to remove this card and make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taurnil
card.text: Unique. Nando. -2 prowess against Animals and Awakened Plants. +2 prowess against Orcs.

card.name: Ted Sandyman
card.text: Unique. Agent. May not be among the starting characters, unless you start the game at Bag End. May only be brought into play at his home site (regardless of any other card effects). Unless you are a Dwarf-lord or Gandalf, Mischief in a Mean Way is playable at his current site in The Shire. Agent only: +2 EI against Hobbits.

card.name: The Bullroarer's Club
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Michel Delving. Also playable at any site in The Shire by The Thain or a character bearing Mathom Lore. +1 to prowess. Hobbit Warrior only: +2 prowess and +2 EI against Hobbits.

card.name: The Great Willow
card.text: Unique. Playble at The Willow Dingle. +2 prowess against Hobbits. tap: cancel an Awakened Plant hazard creature attack against one of your companies in Eriador. Discard if its company moves outside of Old Forest.

attr.value: Rangers of the North faction is playable at this site.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one Dúnadan or Elf hazard creature normally keyable to a region in Eriador; creature may be taken from discard pile or sideboard.
The first Information card played here does not tap the site.

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.text: Unique. Playable on Bree. Tap a non-overt character during the site phase at Bree to make Information or News from the Shire playable there this turn. Any player may tap an agent at Bree and discard this card to make Nazgûl creatures playable at the site (not counting against the hazard limit if a ringbearer is present).Discard this card if Bree leaves active play.

card.name: The Ring's Dominion
card.text: Playable on your Fallen-wizard or Elf-lord if Spells Born of Discord is in play. Instead of tapping to use a magic ring he bears, he may make a CC and tap the magic ring.

attr.value: Contains a hoard. If Here, There or Yonder is played at this site to bring Tom Bombadil into play, it is automatically successfull.
Contains a hoard. Unless the automatic-attack was cancelled this turn,Blackbole may be played at this site (even if tapped).

card.name: There Is Always Vengeance
card.text: Unique. Playable on Aragorn II or Strider, if youare a Wizard but your Wizard is not in play. He receives +1 to mind, prowess, and body, and +3 to EI. When eliminated he gives -5 mp. He may tap during the organization phase to shuffle one resource or character from your sideboard into your play deck. You may take this card into hand from your sideboard or discard pile when you play Sacrifice of Form. Discard this card if your Wizard enters play.

card.name: There's Queer Folk About
card.text: Opponent must reveal to you any (grey) agent or hazards playable on a (grey) agent he has in his hand. If none are available he must reveal his whole hand. If you are Fallen-Saruman, you may also play this card as a hazard.

card.name: Thrice Told Tales
card.text: Playable on a sage. Bearer is not considered a sage. Discard this card if his company moves with at least two regions in its site path or to a non-Darkhaven [K] Under-deeps site.

card.name: Travelled to the Corners of the World
card.graphics: Travelled to the Corners of the World.jpg
card.text: Playable if you have in play: at least 1 faction playable at a site in the Northern Waste; at least 1 faction playable at a site in the Great Central Plains; at least 1 faction playable at a site in the Sun-lands; and if there is a site in a Coastal Sea [c] region in your discard pile. Place this card in your mp pile. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Troll-shaws
card.text: Lore. Playable on a character at Ettenmoors. If a Hobbit, he gains the sage skill and this card may be stored at Bag End for 1 mp. If a ranger, he may tap to bring Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile to your play deck. If a sage, he may tap to take Dawn Take You All from your discard pile to your hand. If a scout, he may tap to make major items playable at Ettenmoors this turn (even hoard items). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: True Hearted Man
card.text: Unique. Playable on Boromir II if his company faces a creature attack with multiple strikes. He receives +1 prowess against the attack and must face a separate strike sequence for each strike of the attack. Discard this card if he is wounded after the attack. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Many Foes He Fought from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: Hobbits — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment). Pippin may tap to cancel this automatic- attack.
taTap a Hobbit during the site phase to make major items playable at this site this turn.
(1st) Hobbits — 6 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess.
all automatic-attacks at sites in The Shire receive -1 to prowess and strikes.

card.name: Until All Else Is Conquered
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H], if the bearer of The One Ring is there. Any non-minion company at the site faces 3 attacks (cannot be canceled by any effect) at the beginning of the site phase: Orcs — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls— 3 strikes 10 prowess; Nazgûl — 2 strikes with 13 prowess. Discard The One Ring if any strike against its bearer is successful. If all attacks are defeated, place this card in opponents mp pile. The bearer of The One Ring cannot leave the site while this card is in play. Cannot be duplicated.
